imdb.title: Urusei yatsura
imdb.plot: The series begins when aliens from the planet Oniboshi invade Earth. They agree to leave only if Earth's champion can defeat the Oni champion in a game of tag within a ten-day time limit. Earth's champion, randomly selected by the...

episodes.title: Scary! Is That an Octopus on Shutaro's Head?
episodes.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

episodes.title: Invader from Space! He's After Lum's Lips!
episodes.plot: An alien arrives on Earth planning world domination. Unfortunately for him he decides to possess the body of Ataru in order to accomplish his plan.

episodes.title: Space Survival! They Are the Eaters
episodes.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

episodes.title: It's a Thrill! The Terrible Overhead Cooler
episodes.plot: It's a sweltering summer day, and everyone's all hot and bothered, except Lum. She's staying cool with an alien cooler that produces a floating, mind-controlled ice block. She gives some to her classmates, but warns them that stress will make the blocks of ice grow and come crashing down on their heads. If the stress levels reach their peak, then the user's fantasies will become projected in the ice, which opens up all sorts of impure possibilities for Ataru.

episodes.title: Love Attack! The Romance Never Stops!!
episodes.plot: Lum employs a Cupid to shoot a love arrow into Ataru. Ataru is determined that isn't going to happen. Let's hope Cupid doesn't dart anyone else by accident because that would certainly cause trouble.

episodes.title: Rare Form! Worries for Mother the Firefighter!!
episodes.plot: Ten has an unexpected visit from his mother and has to make a good impression by being nice to Ataru in her presence. He sets out to find a Carnation to give to her for her birthday.

episodes.title: Hard-selling Happiness! Out of Focus Bluebird!!
episodes.plot: 'Bluebird, the serial fulfill er' escapes to Earth and attempts to spread happiness by making people's dreams come true. It doesn't go quite to plan though.

episodes.title: Great Uproar! Ryuunosuke's First Time Wearing a Swimsuit!!
episodes.plot: Ryuunosuke finds letters hidden by her father that shed light on her origins. Events unfold which result in a duel between father and child on Ganryu Island.

episodes.title: I Want a Bride! The Fox's Love Adventure!
episodes.plot: Summer draws to a close and lonesome Shinobu sends a letter to her fox friend at Fox village. Little Fox turns up with a bunch of dandelions hoping to seal their relationship in marriage.

episodes.title: How Persistent! The Girl Trio's Great Animal Plan!
episodes.plot: The Spice Girls are back and looking for trouble. They plan to deploy a vain, wily ostrich against Lum, but should that fail they have a tougher adversary in reserve.

episodes.title: Fast Money in Fast Fighting! Hamajaya's Forbidden Business
episodes.plot: Shutaro sneakily invites just Lum and Shinobu to go surfing at his Marine Park but has to invite the whole class after they find out. By chance, Ryuu and her father are already there, short of cash and looking to work a scam.

episodes.title: Wish Upon a Star! The Winning Family's Consumer Panic
episodes.plot: The Moroboshi family are suffering financial difficulties. Can a Tanabata Wishing Star help them out? Will they be able to make the right wishes?

episodes.title: Special Delivery Kiss! Darling's First Jealousy!
episodes.plot: A frog named Pigmo requires a kiss from his number one love in order to return to his normal form. This happens to be Lum, and Ataru is not happy about it.

episodes.title: Scary Sake! Sakura's Possession a Big Failure
episodes.plot: Miss Sakura becomes possessed by a spirit spirit. No problem, she only needs to avoid alcohol and the spirit will be forced to leave her body. Attending Shutaro's outdoor tea ceremony seems safe enough.

episodes.title: It's Strange! Cherry's Yoga School!
episodes.plot: It's been raining for a week and everyone is out of shape, so the gang decide to attend Cherry's Tomobiki Yoga School to get fit again. Even Ataru is keen but only because he thinks girls will be there.

episodes.title: Good-bye Onsen-Sensei!? Tearful Good-bye Marathon Banquet!
episodes.plot: Rumour has it that teacher Onsen is retiring from Tomobiki High School. In fact he is spending time in the wilderness training his body and mind prior to a school marathon run.

episodes.title: Pure Love Sakura! The Slippery Soap of Separation?
episodes.plot: Tsubame and Sakura's romantic date seems fated not to go smoothly, especially after Suakura takes a shower and accidentally uses Lum's super slippery home made soap.

episodes.title: Asuka vs. Older Brother! Battle for Certain Love!
episodes.plot: Asuka is unreasonably terrified of all men except her adored big brother Ton. Their mother arranges a duel between the two. If Ton wins, then Asuka must finally allow her brother his freedom from her overbearing attention.

episodes.title: Darling's Ill Omen! The Dreaded Fourth Dimensional Oracle!!
episodes.plot: Ataru and Lum pay to have their good fortunes (Omikuji) predicted. Unfotunately, their wishes appear to be incompatible. This could take up both time and money then.

episodes.title: New Years Panic! The Mendou Family's Human Parcheesi Tournament!
episodes.plot: Ataru, Shutaro, Shinobu, Lum and Jariten are under the impression that they are about to attend a lavish New Year's party at the Mendou estate. In fact they are about to become token pieces in a bizarre three dimensional board game.

episodes.title: Dreaming Ten-chan! The Great Adventure at the End of the Rainbow!
episodes.plot: A fairy with the power to make children's wishes come true needs Ten's help to find his lost magical umbrella. Apon safe return of the umbrella Ten will be granted one wish. Ataru soon muscles in on the action himself.

episodes.title: I Want to Date! Ataru's Test Program!
episodes.plot: Shinobu unwisely jokes with Ataru that she will go on a date with him if he can come first at any subject in the upcoming school exams. Ataru plans to cheat of course, with some help from The Patron Saint of Scholarship, Michizane Sugawara

episodes.title: Darling Said He Loved Me
episodes.plot: Encouraged by Lum and Shinobu, Sakura cooks up a passion pill recipe in her cauldron. The girls employ sly tactics to get Ataru and Shutaro to eat the pills with spectacular results. It soon becomes apparent that something has gone wrong.

episodes.title: Death-Defying House Call! A Teacher Life Is Dangerous Too!!
episodes.plot: Mr.Onsen is mentally exhausted after years of woeful disrespect shown to him by his pupils. Believing that bad attitudes start at home he decides to visit the families one by one to put the parents straight. What a trooper.

episodes.title: Total Chaos! Ran-chan's Giant Doll!
episodes.plot: The class of Tomobiki High continue to treat teacher Onsen with utter contempt. He arranges for them to undertake a meditation session. That should put them right.

episodes.title: Blind Love! You Bet Your Life, Honest Fox
episodes.plot: Granny tells Little Fox the tale of a fox who rescues a pretty village girl from a photograph in which she has been imprisoned by an unpleasant Oni. Little Fox attempts to release his beloved Shinobu from a picture in the same way.

episodes.title: Come Quickly, Darling! Lum's Dangerous Marriage Talk
episodes.plot: Ataru is chasing after girls when he should be on a date with Lum. When he does finally turn up an hour late he finds her in a clinch with a strange jungle man who wants to marry her. Lum decides it's time to force Ataru to fight for her.

episodes.title: It's Unbearable! Ran's Mischief Campaign
episodes.plot: Ran and Lum take an inadvisable trip down memories lane. Sadly, the past turns out to have been rather less than happy for Ran. Her volatile character goes into full Jekyll and Hyde mode as yet again she plans revenge on her old pal Lum.

episodes.title: Urusei Yatsura Pre-Departure Special! Shine!
episodes.plot: It is a week before the final episode of Urusei Yatsura, and Cherry shows clips of episodes that were nominated by fans as their favorite.

episodes.title: All-Star Banquet! We Are Immortal!!
episodes.plot: It's time for the Tomobiki High School costume party, and just about everyone is invited.

episodes.title: The Armored Girl Returns! Plenty of Older Brothers
episodes.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

episodes.title: The Boredom Syndrome! Is Tomobiki Wasting Away?
episodes.plot:

episodes.plot:

episodes.title: The Armored Girl Returns Again! A Storm Raising Date
episodes.plot:

episodes.plot:

episodes.title: First Love Relived!? A Return to the Past for Lum and Rei
episodes.plot:
Know what this is about?

episodes.title: Appearance of the Youthful Old Man! Shine, Great Teahouse of Dreams!
episodes.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

episodes.title: I Love Darling's Sincerity
episodes.plot: Ataru agrees to help the ghost of a young girl fulfill her dying wish so she can go to Heaven. Her wish was to have Ataru wear the sweater she made for him, and to go on a date with Ataru... much to Lum's annoyance.

episodes.title: The Honest Fox Again! I Love Shinobu
episodes.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

episodes.title: I Love the Sea! Prayers for the Thriving Hamajaya!?
episodes.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

episodes.title: Ryuunosuke vs. Benten! The Fruitless Duel of Passion
episodes.plot: Benten and Ryuunosuke meet again, Benten tries to pick a fight with Ryuunosuke, and Ryuunosuke tells Benten to be more feminine. After several near-fights, the Principal decides to settle once and for all which girl is the most feminine by forcing them to take part in a domestic play, and both girls play the housewife.

episodes.title: The Magic Bottle! What's to Become of Me?
episodes.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

episodes.title: The Great Devil's Debut! Lum's Dangerous Purchase!
episodes.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

episodes.title: Goodness! Words Aren't Getting to Darling
episodes.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

episodes.title: The Devil's Summer! Ten-chan's Eel Lunch Plot!
episodes.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

episodes.title: Visitation Panic! I Didn't Mean Any Harm
episodes.plot: Ran catches an Earthling cold and asks Lum to look after her, but is that really wise considering Lum's rather accident prone nature when she's around Ran?

episodes.title: Man or Bird? An Opulent and Luxurious Superhero!
episodes.plot: After yet another clobbering from Ataru, Ten encounters a traveling superhero with a ridiculously long name, and he gives Ten various accessories to make him into a superhero too.

episodes.title: Attack Your Seniors! The Revenge of the Girl Trio
episodes.plot: The three "Spice Girls" - Sugar, Pepper, and Ginger, have come to Earth to mess with Lum. Ataru and Lum make a deal that is she doesn't lose her temper for 3 days, he will to go on a date with her.

episodes.title: Omiai Hell! Is the Armored Girl a Beauty? Or a Beast?
episodes.plot: Mendou learns he is arranged to marry the sister of Tobimaro, and Tobimaro learns that he actually has a sister.

episodes.title: I Dearly Need You! Return of the Honest Fox!
episodes.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

episodes.title: I Hate Gossiping Flowers!
episodes.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

episodes.title: The Birth of Ten-chan's Son? I Didn't Know a Thing
episodes.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

episodes.title: Lum's Courageous Duel! An Ironic Victory
episodes.plot: After a high school student is bullied by Soban, Lum intervenes. The girl then sets a fight between Lum and Soban. Lum, realizing that she does not have the strength to defeat Soban, decides to 'cheat' by using strength-enhancing drugs.

episodes.title: Job Hunting! Return of the Runaway Ninja Kaede!!
episodes.plot: The female ninja Kaede has escaped from her master Yatsude into Tomobiki, where she wishes to start a new life.

episodes.title: Tomobiki High School Survival! Who Are the Survivors?
episodes.plot:

episodes.title: The Mysterious Giant Cake! Love's Fleeing Panic!!
episodes.plot:
Know what this is about?

episodes.title: Underground Reincarnation! What's Darling Thinking Of!?
episodes.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

episodes.title: Play Panic? The Mendou Family Cherry Blossom Display Banquet!!
episodes.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

episodes.title: From the Far Spring! The Tale of the Lonely Fairy!!
episodes.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

episodes.title: To Dreamland! Darling Battle Royal Abduction
episodes.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

episodes.title: Return of the Girl Trio! The Great Scheme to Seduce Darling!!
episodes.plot: The Spice Girls return to Earth to try and use sex appeal to seduce Ataru away from Lum. Poor Ataru's finds it rather difficult to go on his usual 'girl hunts' today, with these three constantly following him around and bugging him.

episodes.title: The Scampering Kotatsu Neko! Anything to Get Warm
episodes.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

episodes.title: Ryuunosuke's Father's Self Sacrificing Devotion! His Wife Is Within Images!
episodes.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

episodes.title: Spring Blossom! Frozen by Oyuki's Cold
episodes.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

episodes.title: Panic Among Friends! I Love to Eat Blowfish
episodes.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

episodes.title: Dimensional Switch: Where's Darling?
episodes.plot: Lum keeps crossing into the wrong parallel dimensions, which all lead her to Tomobiki and Ataru, yet exist under far different circumstances. She hopes the next dimension and the next Ataru are actually the real ones.

episodes.title: Crash! Her Majesty and the Rugger Man of Love
episodes.plot: Ryuu has stopped wearing her chest warp, and is noticeably bustier to her classmates. Of course he boys on her rugby team are eager to grope her during the game. A tiny, rugby ball-shaped UFO arrives, and takes Ryuu, Ataru and Lum on board.

episodes.title: The Indelible Magic Lipstick
episodes.plot: After a lipstick ad takes the country by storm, Lum concocts her own magnetic lipstick in hopes to get Ataru to kiss her. However, Ataru has other plans for the lipstick.

episodes.title: Benten & Ryuunosuke: Run for the Morrow!
episodes.plot: Ryuunosuke and Benten bond as they search for a little girl's lost kitten and fight off a gang of motorcycle punks.

episodes.title: Great Horrors! Oyuki Is Finally Angered!!
episodes.plot: Ran visits Oyuki to complain about the Neptunian lemmings which ate her food for Rei. Ran later discovers that the lemming leader aboard her ship, eating everything in sight. Oyuki makes a surprise visit to Earth, searching for the lemming.

episodes.title: Ten-chan's Wonderful Love Story
episodes.plot: Ten befriends the ghost of a young girl whose dying wish was to hold a puppy.

episodes.title: Haunted House Special! Quest for Mendou Estate Treasure!!
episodes.plot: Mendou's grandfather implores him to seek out a family treasure, the map of which is on the body of a rare Antarctic octopus that lives on the estate.

episodes.title: Lum-chan's Becoming a Cow?!
episodes.plot: Lum and Ataru visit a pet shop which has a cow among other things. The cow bites Lum's hand, and later she discovers that her horns have grown long like a cow's. She then fears that she is slowly turning into a cow.

episodes.title: Great Achievement! The Film of Lum-chan's Youth
episodes.plot: Megane's directing a movie, and asked Mendou, Shinobu, Ataru and Lum to participate. Prior to filming, he individually pitched to them wildly different storylines in order to get them on board. What is this film really about anyway?

episodes.title: Ghostbusting! Exorcising the Beautiful Sakura!
episodes.plot: Cherry has taken Sakura's wand to be purified, so now all the ghosts and goblins are haunting her in the school infirmary, causing her much grief.

episodes.title: Attack of the Protozoa! Panic at the Poolside
episodes.plot: After Ataru and the other guys clean out the school's swimming pool, Ten accidentally drops his alien snacks in the water, causing the protozoa in the water to grow to gigantic sizes.

episodes.title: Here Again! The Hunter of Love, Princess Kurama
episodes.plot: Princess Kurama is back, and now she's set her sights on Rei, much to Ran's chagrin. Kurama's taken Rei away, and Ran enlists a reluctant Lum to travel to Kurama's place to get him back. Kurama has no idea that Rei can turn into a tiger-cow, and her crow underlings desperately try to keep her from ever finding out.

episodes.title: The Fox's Unrequited Love
episodes.plot: After Shinobu saves him from a pack of dogs, a little fox becomes smitten with her and attempts to return the favor.

episodes.title: Pitiful! Mother of Love and Banishment!?
episodes.plot: A rare look into the life and mind of Ataru's mother.

episodes.title: The House of Mendou: Summer Xmas
episodes.plot: Ryoko invites couples from all over town to attend the a summer Christmas party at the Mendou estate. The couples, chained together, must rappel up a huge Christmas tree in order to reach the banquet at the top. The first couple to make it to the top will receive a kiss from either Ryoko or Mendou, those who fail will plummet to their deaths!

episodes.title: Panic in the Haunted Inn
episodes.plot: Lum, Ataru, Mendou and Shinobu stay at a gloomy old inn that they later discover is haunted by a ghost. But the ghost in question isn't nearly as scary as the elderly couple who runs the inn.

episodes.title: Oh! The Memories of Mother
episodes.plot: Ryuunosuke demands that her father tell her what kind of person her mother was like, but getting a straight answer from him proves frustrating as he tells her one whopper after another.

episodes.title: Big Battle! Ten vs. Ataru
episodes.plot: Ten has gotten sick and tired of getting clobbered every morning by Ataru, so he devises ways to get back at him and win for a change.

episodes.title: Terror! Attack of the Killer Potatoes!
episodes.plot: At a Mendou-owned mountain retreat, Ataru, Lum, Mendou, and Shinobu find themselves in a bizarre 'revenge of nature' scenario as they are attacked by Tororo potatoes.

episodes.title: Galactic Teacher CAO-2 Strikes Back!
episodes.plot: Oyuki meets with Lum, Benten, and Ran to warn them that their old elementary school teacher, CAO-2, has escaped. CAO-2 was a huge, menacing robot teacher shaped like a huge chalkboard eraser. He ran his class with an iron fist, had zero-tolerance for all the pranks that Lum and Benten pulled on him, and often punished them by hurling himself at them. The girls managed to trap him on a stalactite on some remote planet after a chase through space, but now that he's escaped, he's looking for revenge!

episodes.title: Outraged! Piteous Boy Shutaro!
episodes.plot: Lum tries to help Mendou cure his phobias by traveling back to a point in time before he developed those fears. Soon after the gang arrives, they encounter a very bratty little Mendou.

episodes.title: Wow! The Mysterious Matsutake Mushroom Soup!
episodes.plot: Onsen's class has smuggled food ingredients into the classroom for a huge 'nabemono' feast. Cherry shows up with some mushrooms that Ataru identifies as being the highly-prized Matsutake mushrooms. But if these are indeed Matsutake mushrooms, why is it that everyone who's eaten them acting so strange?

episodes.title: Enraged Lum!
episodes.plot: During another one of Ataru & Ten's fights, Ten accidentally burns the scarf that Lum had made for him, yet strangely Lum isn't upset with Ten. Ataru then tries to goad her to become angry with Ten, and later Lum practices disciplining him aboard her UFO. Meanwhile, Ten wanders around town trying to think of the proper way to apologize to her.

episodes.title: Lady Ryuunosuke!
episodes.plot: Onsen-Mark takes Ryuunosuke under his wing and attempts to teach her how to be a woman.

episodes.title: Document! Who'll Be Miss Tomobiki?
episodes.plot: The Principal holds a beauty pageant at the school. Lum, Shinobu, Ryuunosuke, Ran, and Sakura are the lead contenders; while Ataru is chosen to be the judge.

episodes.title: Challenge! Benten VS. The Girl Trio!!
episodes.plot: A trio of middle school-aged girls, who fancy themselves as a gang, steal Benten's chain. They also challenge her, Lum, and Oyuki to a showdown on top of Tomobiki HS for the chain.

episodes.title: Scramble! To the Rescue of Lum!
episodes.plot: After a fight with Ataru one night, Lum goes up to her UFO. As she sleeps, her ship crashes on Mendou's estate, and she has lost her memory. Mendou later tells Ataru that Lum is now staying with him, and will fight to keep her there.

episodes.title: A Fight to the Death! Ataru vs. the Mendou Brigade!
episodes.plot: Ataru, and Lum's Stormtroopers infiltrate the Mendou estate to rescue Lum, but with Mendou's massive private army standing in their way, their mission to save her could end up a suicide mission.

episodes.title: We'll Risk Our Lives During Classtime!
episodes.plot: Onsen's had it with his students' shenanigans, and he's threatening weekend detention if they make so much as a peep in class. The class is determined to avoid detention at any cost, even as Ten shows up to harass them.

episodes.title: Domestic Quarrel: To Eat or Be Eaten?!
episodes.plot: Lum's father got kicked out of the house for greedily eating both his and his wife's food. He has to crash at the Moroboshi's on Earth until things blow over, but now the big guy's eating them out of house and home.

episodes.title: Goodbye Season
episodes.plot: Ataru confides to Megane that he is "giving up", and has chosen him as successor. Megane is elated as he imagines having Lum all to himself. Shinobu, having overheard their conversation, imagines that with Ataru out of the picture, there would change in the class' balance of power would result in her losing Mendou to Lum, causing repercussions far beyond Tomobiki High. She then conspires with the popular girls from the surrounding schools to stop Ataru and protect the status quo.

episodes.title: Happy Birthday My Darling
episodes.plot: Lum and Ataru's relationship becomes strained after she forgets his birthday.

episodes.title: Bottled Letter Seashore Mystery!
episodes.plot: Ataru, Lum, Mendou, Shinobu, and Ten are invited to a creepy old seaside inn for dinner. Little do they realize that they are intended to be dinner.

episodes.title: Firefighter Mommy Visits!
episodes.plot: Ten's mother comes to Earth to visit him, but he's absolutely terrified. His mother is ironically a firefighter who's passionate about her job, responds to fire bells almost instantly, and deals with arsonists with sadistic brutality.

episodes.title: After You've Gone
episodes.plot: Lum, Ataru, Megane & Co. are holding a party to celebrate the 1st anniversary of her arrival on Earth. After Ataru openly gripes about his life with Lum, she gets up and leaves. She can't be found, and it's feared she's left Earth for good.

episodes.title: Lum's Class Reunion
episodes.plot: Lum's alien friends keep popping up at school, and disappearing right before Lum can have a chance to talk to them. Now her feelings are hurt because she feels she's being left out of whatever they're doing.

episodes.title: Lunchtime Eat-Out'ers Gather Round!
episodes.plot: Lately the students of Tomobiki H.S. have been sneaking off campus to eat at the local eateries, and the faculty, led by Onsen, is conspiring to stop them at all costs. It's all-out war, with restaurant district as its battlefield!

episodes.title: The Mendou Siblings!
episodes.plot: Mendou's eccentric little sister Ryoko visits class, much to Mendou's chagrin.

episodes.title: There's a Cat on the Stairs
episodes.plot: Ten brings a huge cat home with him, and he takes an immediate liking to Ataru's kotatsu (foot warmer), and sits on the staircase with it. It's dinnertime, and Ataru can't come downstairs to eat without getting pummeled by that darn cat.

episodes.title: Beware of Earmuffs!
episodes.plot: On a class field trip, Ataru journeys to an underwater kingdom; and Ataru, Lum, Shinobu and Mendou get lost in a cave.

episodes.title: Fly, Imo-chan!
episodes.plot: In the school biology class, Ataru care for a big caterpillar with an equally big appetite.

episodes.title: What a Dracula!
episodes.plot: Count Dracula awakens, and is seeking the blood of a lovely young girl. He chooses Lum as his next victim.

episodes.title: Lum's Education Lecture Course for Boys
episodes.plot: After Mrs. Moroboshi shows her some of photos of a young Ataru, Lum decides that the best way to get him to like her is to travel 10 years into the past and condition him to do so while he's still a child.

episodes.title: From the Gardenia, with Love
episodes.plot: A new flower shop has opened in town, and both Ataru and Ten attempt to win the affections of the beautiful young woman who works there.

episodes.title: A Beautiful Girl Brings Rain
episodes.plot: A beautiful girl named Tsuyuko Amamori moves into Ataru's neighborhood, who happens to bring rain wherever she goes.

episodes.title: The Coming of the Mysterious Red Mantle!
episodes.plot: The mysterious red mantle tries to crash to school festival like he did many years ago - But he has put on some weight.

episodes.title: Panic in a Typhoon!
episodes.plot: The Moroboshis are preparing their home for a typhoon headed their way, and Lum and Ten can hardly wait, since neither of them was no idea what a typhoon is.

episodes.title: Drunkard's Boogie
episodes.plot: At school, Ataru discovers that Oni become intoxicated by umeboshi (pickled plums), and that both Lum and Ten are the worst kind of drunks: mean drunks! Scores of students end up in the infirmary from Lum's electricity, and Ten's flames.

episodes.title: The Terror of Meow
episodes.plot: Late one night atop the roof of the Moroboshi home, Ataru, Ten, and an eyepatch-wearing bruiser of a cat named Torajima fight for the affections of a beautiful cat-woman.

episodes.title: I'm Lum-chan the Notorious/It's Raining Oil in Our Town
episodes.plot: Ataru has been randomly selected from Earth's population to face Lum Invader in a duel that will determine the Earth's fate./Lum's Stormtroopers summon Lum's UFO but instead get an intergalactic taxi that takes them through subspace. The fare for the taxi is the value of all the oil on the planet.

episodes.title: Space Mail Delivery! Ten-chan Arrives!/Mrs Swallow and Mrs. Penguin
episodes.plot: A peach falls from the sky that Lum's cousin, Ten has travelled to her in. He is capable of breathing fire and fights with Ataru./Ten feeds his alien candy to a swallow, and made the swallow turn into a penguin-like creature. Each time an earth creature continues to eat alien candy, the creature will become a giant.

episodes.title: The Handsome Shape-Changer Rei Arrives!/Die, Ladykiller!
episodes.plot: Shinobu meets upon Rei, Lum's handsome ex-fiancé, and brings him to Ataru's house, much to the dismay of Lum./Ataru and his friends find Rei in a restaurant. His poor Japanese being mocked makes him go wild, and as he chases the boys and Lum throughout town, the chaos grows on.

episodes.title: Sleeping Beauty Princess Kurama/Athletic Woman Hell!
episodes.plot: The beautiful Crow princess Kurama is awakened by a kiss from Ataru. In accordance with her race's traditions, she must mate with him. Naturally Ataru is more than happy to oblige, but she wants absolutely nothing to do with him.

episodes.title: Ataru Genji Visits Heinkyo
episodes.plot: Lum somehow ends up in the Heian period of Japan and now she must stop some ogres from the future before they kill Ataru's ancestor.

episodes.title: Oh, Lonely Teacher! Kuribayashi Sensei Appears/Terrible Inspection Day
episodes.plot: In part 1, Ataru's brutal new homeroom teacher Kuribayashi has it in for him, and has a Lolita-complex thing for Lum. In part 2, it's Open House Day at Tomobiki High School, and a confrontation between the mothers of Lum and Mendou bring both planets to the brink of interstellar war.

episodes.title: Girl's Day! Ran-chan's Arrival/Ran-chan's Introduction
episodes.plot: Lum's childhood friend Ran comes to Earth, but she's here to seek revenge on Lum for all times that Lum got her in trouble when they were both little. She also tries to suck out Ataru's youth by kissing him.

episodes.title: Sleeping in Class on a Wonderful Spring Day/Peach Blossom Poetry Contest
episodes.plot: A fairy and her master put Ataru's class to sleep. While having a poetry contest the gang stumbles upon a strange woman.

episodes.title: Duel! Ataru vs. Ataru/Waking to a Nightmare
episodes.plot: I'm "Duel. Ataru vs. Ataru" Ataru gets divided into 2 beings that are completely different. In "Walking to a Nightmare" Ataru goes to a deep sleep in class and his dreams make Mendo furious at Ataru and seconds away to kill him.

episodes.title: The Great Space Matchmaking Operation
episodes.plot: Lum's father tricks Lum into coming home in order to hold a matchmaking ceremony for her, where thousands of alien suitors await her. Little did they know that Ataru has found out, and is on his way to the Oni homeworld to crash the party.
